channel.title: Very very tricky question please help!
channel.description:
hi, now i have a question that people on the official thread couldnt figure out either, but does anyone know how to make an npc heal itself after it hits someone? like the saradomin godsword spec, only it heals double, and how do i make an npcs' max hit higher?
a little more information source:pkplanet v2 client:pkplanet official client npc for editing: commander zilyana
